amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding for the IRS's identify theft and refund fraud casework program by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.
